config.dynamic_fps.title: Dynamic Anchor Code o' Conduct
config.dynamic_fps.idle_time_tooltip: Minut's without workin' on deck before Dynamic Anchor declares you are Nappin' Below Deck.
config.dynamic_fps.uncap_menu_frame_rate: Makes th' 60-knots Speed Limit in th' main menu walk th' plank.
config.dynamic_fps.graphics_state_minima: A blurry lens causes th' sea to be remapped!
config.dynamic_fps.run_garbage_collector: Order th' Ship Janitor to Swab th' Deck
Frees up ship resources when switching to th' state.
gui.dynamic_fps.hud.disabled: Avast, be th' Dynamic Anchor! Sailing at Full Mast
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.dynamic_f: Magically edits yer Ship's speed limit so Minecraft doesn't steal yer booty when yer not lookin'.
